name: Crazy Maze.io - colorful run and dash game
name_original: Crazy Maze.io - colorful run and dash game
description:
Crazy maze is a fast paced game where you guide your character through different mazes to collect golden coins. Avoid the crazy moving red dots.

> Touch and drag to move blue smiley face character
> Collect gold coins to score points
> Avoid the red dots
> Most of all, beat your friends!

How far can you go?
